title: The private chain runs out of question, and the original data is lost.
body:
- [ ] I've asked for help in the [Truffle Gitter](http://gitter.im/Consensys/truffle) before filing this issue.

---------------------------

## Issue
![qq 20180425094145](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5866771/39222037-f2b50a18-486c-11e8-80c6-a29915ac2dfc.png)

INFO [04-24|14:02:13] Initialising Ethereum protocol           versions="[63 62]" network=371


## Steps to Reproduce

The above log appeared in the running process, and the chaindata directory was rebuilt. The original data was lost, and no action records were deleted in the system.
## Expected Behavior
Run normally, at least chaindata will not be lost。

## Actual Results

The chaindata folder is rebuilt, and the original data is lost
## Environment

* Operating System: Centos 6.8 64bit
* Ethereum client:Geth/v1.7.0-unstable-f4841ff4/linux-amd64/go1.8.1
* Truffle version (`truffle version`):v2.1.2
* node version (`node --version`):v6.10.3
* npm version (`npm --version`): 3.10.10
